amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments printed in Part B of House Report 117-110 as en bloc No. 3: Nos. 7 and 8.
amendment.purpose: Amendments en bloc No. 3 comprised of amendments numbered 7 and 8 printed in Part B of House Report 117-110.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ryan amendments (A004) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 180 - 243 (Roll no. 237).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A004) pursuant to the rule.
Amendments en bloc (A004) offered by Mr. Ryan.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendments en bloc (A004) offered by Mr. Ryan.

House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Ryan amendments (A004) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 180 - 243 (Roll no. 237).
Amendment failed by House: On agreeing to the Ryan amendments (A004) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 180 - 243 (Roll no. 237).
